item.title: Powershell: Install role or feature on multiple remote servers
item.description: Today I was presented with a task that sounded pretty boring and repetitive: Install the Windows Search service on all our citrix servers. Now, I could just log on each and every one of our citrix servers, open Server Manager and then install the role service but where’s the fun in that? As always Powershell is a lot more fun: First I had to find the name of all our citrix servers.
